title: From batch to flow: the effect of pH, current, and crystal facets of Cu2O on the electrochemical CO2 reduction
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00130C, Paper
Mathias van der Veer, Nick Daems, Pegie Cool, Tom Breugelmans
As humanity is confronted by climate change, electrochemical CO2 reduction has become an important strategy for generating value-added chemicals whilst lowering carbon emissions. In this work, Cu2O nanoparticles with different...
